name: Encrypt4all Theme File
summary: Learn about .ETFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ETFF files are used for customizing the look and feel of the Encrypt4all user interface.

description: File created by Encrypt4all Theme Maker, a program used for creating themes for the Encrypt4all file encryption software; contains color settings for different user interface elements, such as the toolbar, status bar, text boxes, and combo boxes.
